the heightfield in a better way, however the CLOD transitions might be
visible due to the vertices not matching exactly. subprocess-window filename The filename of a SubprocessWindowBuffer's temporary mmap file, used
for opening a window in a child process and rendering to a different
window in the parent process. This is specifically used for OSX when the
plugin is compiled, and is not used or needed in other environments. See
